>@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.Y4ajp13ACVnzaS5s]{Drone Chassis}

Bigger than other chassis options, the combat drone moves along the ground and is outfitted with wheels, tracks, legs, or a similar form of propulsion. This drone is designed specifically for battle. It has an armored body and multiple weapon mounts, allowing it to pack a variety of armaments.

Initial Mods

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.mWgbjM9nJrFGfwbz]{Reductive Plating (Ex)},

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.dDZLj7L4psee7UZc]{Weapon Mount (Ex)} or @Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.jhrcNqb8XKqUYp7P]{Melee Weapon Arm (Ex)} (up to 2 in any combination),

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.vNquSwcfuyifFgQs]{Weapon Proficiency (Ex)}
